inputLayersSummaryText: Find the closest features from the Near layer for each feature in the Input layer. Optionally select barrier layers to restrict travel in certain areas when the analysis uses a travel mode.

itemProperties.description: Feature layer generated from running the Find Closest analysis tool.
itemProperties.snippet: Feature layer generated from Find Closest

limitNearNumberLabel: Limit the number of closest locations
maxCountLabel: Max number of closest locations to find per input
